description: This file defines the FavoritesPage React component, which displays a list of favorite recipes, allows users to open individual recipes, or remove them from favorites. It uses context for favorites data and navigation functions for routing.

methods.name: FavoritesPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the Favorites page with list of favorite recipes and actions.

methods.name: openRecipe
methods.description: Handles opening a selected recipe by navigating to its detail page.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Handles navigation back to the home page.
